name: Twitter Search
special_instructions: One of search_query or url must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The filter_options is an object that can contain language and verified_users as properties
The user_id is the id of the user whose tweets you want to scrape
The Search Terms is an array of search queries
The Max Tweets Per Query/Profile/URL is the maximum number of tweets to scrape per query, profile, or URL
The tool delivers tweets at Blazing Fast Speeds with Historical Search and Other Unique Features. Search is no longer limited by date!
The tool will return all the fields listed in the 'actor_output_fields' regardless of any privacy or any other limit
